haberman.rhizomatics.map.polys

Class PolyDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.map.polys.PolyDrawer

  • public class PolyDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
    Since we can't set the stroke width of a polygon (issue #4087), this container stores the drawing of an area as both a Polyline and a Polygon. Also contains different public method for quick styling updates.

                  int fill_color,
                  int stroke_color,
                  float stroke_width,
                  float[] alphas)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        points - An ArrayList of LatLng locations describing the shape of this PolyDrawer
        holes - A list of LatLng describing eventual holes in the base polygon
        fill_color - The fill ColorInt of this shape
        stroke_color - The fill ColorInt of this shape
        alphas - An array of alpha's factors for both polygon_ and polyline_
